mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orderlist_product (prod_no, order_no, each_qty) VALUES (#{prod_no},#{order_no},#{each_qty})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orderlist ol INNER JOIN (SELECT op.prod_no, op.order_no, op.each_qty, p.prod_name, p.img_url FROM orderlist_product op INNER JOIN product p ON op.prod_no = p.prod_no) op ON ol.order_no=op.order_no WHERE customer_id=#{customer_id} AND TO_CHAR(order_date,'yyyymmdd') >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(sysdate,-3),'yyyymmdd') ORDER BY ol.order_date desc
